displayName.text: #1 NYC Elopement & Officiant Packages - Everly Studios

formattedAddress: 141 Worth St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 141 Worth St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
Jocelyn is a fabulous wedding photographer, and we're absolutely thrilled with her photos of our NYC elopement. Not only is she really talented, she's also lovely to work with.

We were keeping an eye on our budget, but photography was top priority and we didn't want to compromise. Jocelyn was really accommodating with this and gave us plenty of options. She was also very patient with all our questions!

As for the wedding itself, she shot the day perfectly. Number one, she captured our happiness and we feel good about ourselves in the pictures (this was no mean feat as we generally look awkward in photos and previously owned just one or two that we actually liked!) On top of this, she ticked off our dream NY backdrops: from the Ladies Pavilion and Bethesda Terrace in Central Park, to Times Square, and the zebra crossing at Radio City Music Hall (she literally risked life and limb to get that one). As if this wasn't enough, she even photoshopped the mud I'd got on my dress from our favourite photos, so we have several solid "framers." An extra thank you for this!

I would 100% recommend Jocelyn for an NYC elopement or wedding (which let's be honest, is basically an excuse for a photoshoot anyway).

originalText.text: I am so happy we chose Jocelyn to photograph and coordinate our NYC elopement . Jocelyn made the entire process so easy and stress free. She stayed in constant communication throughout the entire process, coordinated  the schedule for the day of, and had a plan for all types of weather situations (we got married the day after it flooded in early Sept). I am not a big planner and waited until the last minute to get a lot done, she made the process seamless and completely stress free. She walked us through every step from start to finish so we knew exactly what to prepare for the day of. She was so personable and gave us the best wedding day possible! She even sent over “sneak peak” photos a day or so after our wedding day so we could share with family/friends. Her style of photography is beautiful and we couldn’t be happier with the end results!!

originalText.text:
I can not say enough wonderful things about Jocelyn and Everly Studios. Jocelyn made our virtual wedding so easy. She was proactive in all communication, gave super clear instructions, and totally set us up for success. She walked us through every step from start to finish. She immediately felt like a friend that wanted us to have the best wedding day possible.

In a year of tons of pivots and challenges, Jocelyn went above and beyond to make our virtual wedding perfect. She took the time to get to know us as a couple and tailor the ceremony to us and our guests. She officiated with grace and professionalism, while keeping things light and personal (which is exactly what we asked for.)  I know if we wanted something more formal she would have delivered there as well.

I highly highly highly recommend using any of Everly Studios for your wedding. You will be so happy that you did! Thank you so much for an easy-breezy experience Jocelyn!

originalText.text: We used Everly Studios to officiate a Marriage Ceremony remotely. Jocelyn was our officiant, and did a fantastic job! She was very knowledgeable about what steps needed to be taken in order to officiate the marriage and led us through the process of completing paperwork with through details. She was even able to book our event with extremely short notice! If you are planning on getting married and looking for a NYC wedding officiant, I would highly recommend Jocelyn!

originalText.text: Jocelyn is so pleasant to work with. She is amazing!! MY fiance and I were so confused about the whole process of Zoom marriage and she explained everything in details. It was everything we wanted it to be. Quick and very easy! She's the best nyc wedding officiant! We recommend her 100%. Thank you Jocelyn for your help :)
